dataset_description.Name: Mobile EEG split-belt walking study
dataset_description.Acknowledgements: Noelle A. Jacobsen and Daniel P. Ferris (2023). Mobile EEG split-belt walking study. OpenNeuro. [Dataset] doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds004475.v1.0.0
dataset_description.HowToAcknowledge: Noelle A. Jacobsen and Daniel P. Ferris (2023). Mobile EEG split-belt walking study. OpenNeuro. [Dataset] doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds004475.v1.0.0

readme_content: This mobile brain body imaging (MoBI) experiment investigates brain activity correlated to gait adaptation during split-belt treadmill walking. 30 participants completed an abrupt and gradual split-belt walking paradigm (2:1 belt speed ratio).

github_info.description: OpenNeuro dataset - Mobile EEG split-belt walking study
